titleInfo.title: Recent results from lattice QCD simulations

mods.abstract: Some recent results of lattice simulations of QCD at non-zero temperature will be reviewed. In particular, the critical temperature, investigations into the nature of the phase transition and new results for the equation of state of the quark-gluon plasma will be discussed.
